channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bosses: Workers have no clue what you’re talking about when you use these acronyms
item.description: Acronyms to make the list include IRL and WFH—despite the latter dominating workplace conversations for well over four years.

item.title: Sanction the Disgraceful ICC
item.description: Issuing arrest warrants against Israeli leaders for their just war against Hamas is a moral abomination from an illegitimate body.

item.title: Nashville Reporter Only Sees Racism In Moving To A Christianity-Friendly Small Town
item.description: As Venezuelan gang soldiers set up shop in Tennessee, a Nashville reporter directs ire at a handful of American families who’ve moved in.

item.title: To Restore Democracy Trump Will Have To Overcome Administrative State Tyranny
item.description: The second Trump administration was elected as the antidote to the administrative state — to make radical changes in personnel and policy.

item.title: Senators tee up post-Thanksgiving votes on more of Biden's judicial nominees
item.description: The Senate departed for its Thanksgiving break Thursday with a deal in place to vote on six of President Biden's judicial nominees when they return.
